valsi.definition: $x_1$ li kalama tan uta e kalama $x_2$
valsi.notes: nimi pi kon poka li ni: {krixa}, {cmoni}, {voksa}, {cusku}, {tavla}

valsi.definition: $x_1$ li kili palisa jelo anu kasi pi kili ni, li tan kulupu kasi sama $x_2$
valsi.notes: nimi pi kon poka li ni: {grute}, {plise}, {nimre}
pilin ni li sama pilin pi pana telo tan oko. nimi pi kon poka li ni: {uinai}, {klaku}, {cinmo}, {gleki}

valsi.definition: $x_1$ li tawa pi tenpo lili, lon supa $x_2$, kepeken palisa noka $x_3$, li tawa e noka kepeken nasin $x_4$
valsi.notes: nasin tawa ni la, noka wan li pini pilin e supa la, noka ante li awen lon kon. ni li ante tan kon nimi {cadzu}. nimi ante pi kon poka li ni: {muvdu}, {klama}, {plipe}, {stapa}

keyword.word: jan tawa noka pi tenpo lili
keyword.sense: jan ni li tawa kepeken noka kepeken tenpo lili
ijo li tawa lon supa ni
ijo li tawa e palisa noka lon nasin ni

valsi.definition: $x_1$ li kama lon sama kala, li kama suli sama akesi, li tan kulupu pi akesi kala sama $x_2$
valsi.notes: nimi pi kon poka li ni: {respa}, {danlu}, {since}

valsi.definition: $x_1$ li nasin toki pi kulupu $x_2$ li ken toki e ijo $x_3$
valsi.notes: kulupu toki li ken jan anu ilo. nimi pi kon poka li ni: {tavla}, {cusku}, {valsi}, {gerna}, {jufra}, {natmi}

keyword.sense: jan li toki e toki ijo ni

valsi.definition: $x_1$ li tomo esun pi telo moku $x_2$, li esun tawa $x_3$
valsi.notes: ken la, telo moku li telo nasa. nimi pi kon poka li ni: {gusta}, {pinxe}, {xalka}, {birje}, {jikru}, {vanju}, {zarci}

keyword.sense: jan ken moku e telo ni
jan ni li pana e mani tawa jan esun

valsi.notes: ijo moku li telo la, sina ken kepeken e nimi {pinxe}. nimi ante pi kon poka li ni: {citka}, {xagji}, {batci}, {gusta}

glossword.sense: insa e ijo tawa kama jo e wawa

keyword.sense: jan ni li moku e ijo
jan li ken moku e ni

valsi.definition: $x_1$ li telo pi kule ale tan ma li pali e ni: kasi en soweli li ken lon
valsi.notes: ma telo li ken lukin loje. taso kule ni li tan sewi. telo li jasima e kule ni. nimi pi kon poka li ni: {pinxe}, {ladru}, {litki}, {lalxu}, {rirxe}, {xamsi}, {jmive}

glossword.sense: telo tan ma pi pana ken lon
telo tan ma pi pana ken lon

valsi.definition: $x_1$ li pana e $x_2$ tawa $x_3$, li wile ala e mani
valsi.notes: nimi pi kon poka li ni: {vecnu}, {benji}, {canja}

glossword.sense: pana e ijo tawa jan ante

keyword.sense: jan ni li pana e ijo tawa jan ante
jan wile pana e ni tawa jan ante
jan ni li kama jo e ijo

valsi.definition: $x_1$ li telo walo tan mama meli pi soweli $x_2$

keyword.sense: soweli ni li pana e telo walo

valsi.notes: nimi pi kon poka li ni: {jmive}, {catra}, {sipna}, {sanji}
nimi pi kon poka li ni: {nelci}, {xamgu}, {prenu}, {bradi}

keyword.word: jan pilin pona tan jan ante

valsi.definition: $x_1$ li moku e telo $x_2$ tan poki anu ma telo $x_3$
valsi.notes: nimi pi kon poka li ni: {citka}, {djacu}, {cidja}, {taske}, {barja}

keyword.sense: jan ni li moku e ijo

valsi.definition: $x_1$ li toki tawa $x_2$ e toki ijo $x_3$ kepeken nasin toki $x_4$
valsi.notes: nimi pi kon poka li ni: {bacru}, {cusku}, {casnu}, {bangu}

glossword.sense: pana e sona ijo kepeken kalama anu sitelen
